title: safar1980
author: safar1980
content: Colorful Offers Up To $1000 US Trade-In Value For Older GPUs When Buying New GeForce RTX 40 CardsThe official Colorful China outlet over at JD.com has announced a brand new promotion allowing users to trade in their older graphics cards to get discounts on their newest purchases. The promo will be applicable on all new purchases between the 7th of May till the 21st of May. Colorful listed a total of 16 cards that are applicable for trade-in along with their value in RMB. The list can be seen below:    Colorful GeForce RTX 2060 - 900 RMB ($130 US)    Colorful GeForce RTX 2060 SUPER - 1100 RMB ($160 US)    Colorful GeForce RTX 2070 - 1500 RMB ($217 US)    Colorful GeForce RTX 2070 SUPER - 1600 RMB ($231 US)    Colorful GeForce RTX 3050 - 1400 RMB ($202 US)    Colorful GeForce RTX 3060 8 GB - 1700 RMB ($246 US)    Colorful GeForce RTX 3060 12 GB - 1750 RMB ($253 US)    Colorful GeForce RTX 3060 Ti - 1800 RMB ($260 US)    Colorful GeForce RTX 3060 Ti G6X - 2300 RMB ($332 US)    Colorful GeForce RTX 3070 - 2400 RMB ($347 US)    Colorful GeForce RTX 3070 Ti - 2700 RMB ($390 US)    Colorful GeForce RTX 3080 - 3400 RMB ($492 US)    Colorful GeForce RTX 3080 Ti - 4300 RMB ($622 US)    Colorful GeForce RTX 3090 - 5600 RMB ($810 US)    Colorful GeForce RTX 3090 Ti - 7200 RMB ($1041 US)Colorful also states that owners of an iGame Neptune or Vulcan variant can get an additional 200 RMB off which will bring the maximum trade-in value to 7400 RMB or $1070 US.https://wccftech.com/colorful-offers-up-to-1000-us-trade-in-value-older-gpus-when-buying-new-geforce-rtx-40-cards/

comments.author: swogerino
comments.body: Quote from: batsonxl on May 09, 2023, 04:22:55 PMLooks like gpu sales doomed  Especially for not so well known brands like Colorful which I have known it only lately in the last bull run in 2021 I saw such brand in Ali Express which was all over the place and the prices strange enough were the same level or near the same as super well known brands like Evga,Palit,Gainward and MSI.I think that now that the price of cryptos suggest we are still in the crypto winter,we most likely will only see further downside of the prices of the GPU-s,some people in Russia as pointed in another thread here are already selling 8 GPU rigs with full parts for the price of one GPU already.

comments.author: FP91G
comments.body: Quote from: swogerino on May 10, 2023, 09:22:51 AMQuote from: batsonxl on May 09, 2023, 04:22:55 PMLooks like gpu sales doomed  Especially for not so well known brands like Colorful which I have known it only lately in the last bull run in 2021 I saw such brand in Ali Express which was all over the place and the prices strange enough were the same level or near the same as super well known brands like Evga,Palit,Gainward and MSI.I think that now that the price of cryptos suggest we are still in the crypto winter,we most likely will only see further downside of the prices of the GPU-s,some people in Russia as pointed in another thread here are already selling 8 GPU rigs with full parts for the price of one GPU already.There are many Colorful video cards in Russia and the build quality is good. The 5000 series will appear only in early 2025, and then according to reviews it will be 5090, so you need to look at prices and offers from competitors. But more than 5 years of payback of a video card in mining greatly reduces demand.

comments.author: safar1980
comments.body: ASUS made a better offer 3 months ago:ASUS offered to trade in old GeForce and Radeon for a discount on the new GeForce RTX 4080 and RTX 4070 Tihttps://technewsspace.com/asus-offered-to-trade-in-old-geforce-and-radeon-for-a-discount-on-the-new-geforce-rtx-4080-and-rtx-4070-ti/

comments.author: FP91G
comments.body: The GeForce RTX 4090 was overclocked to 3825 MHz and set a new absolute record in Unigine Superposition 8K1 day agoDylan HarrisAdd CommentOverclocker CENS repeated the feat of his Galax colleagues, overclocking the GPU of the Colorful GeForce RTX 4090 iGame LAB graphics card to a frequency of 3825 MHz. At the same time, the enthusiast set a new absolute record for a single GPU in the Unigine Superposition benchmark at 8K resolution.https://technewsspace.com/the-geforce-rtx-4090-was-overclocked-to-3825-mhz-and-set-a-new-absolute-record-in-unigine-superposition-8k/
